definition: to print/to publish/publication/periodical/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: That conclusion has been accepted by many as an article of faith ever since.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，這一結論就被許多人當成了不刊之論。

sentences.english: The conclusion, and arguments of this book is unalterable truth.
sentences.chinese: 這本著作的結論和觀點已是不刊之論。
